attributes.action: Provide Free School Meals for all Primary School Children in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like our primary school children in England to have free school meals this service has already been piloted in Scotland with a great success and they are expanding it why should only Scottish children benfit we pay taxes to the same UK goverment and live in England - FREE MEAL to all our primary children in ENGLAND !!
